[Broadside Buckos](/Feats.aspx?ID=4133) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=70)

**Prerequisites**
[Pirate Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2032)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

</column>

---

Shimali Manux trains every Salt Breaker to fight in the cramped quarters below deck, and you've learned how to use these techniques with your crew. During your daily preparations, you can name up to five crewmates you will be working with that day. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your crewmates, that enemy is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against you.
